member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SetViewerPreference(GdPicture12.PdfViewerPreference,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies an option, controlling the way the document is to be presented on the screen or in print in Adobe viewers.
member.param: A member of the PdfViewerPreference enumeration.
True to enable the option else False.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Setting viewing preferences.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SetViewerPreference(PdfViewerPreference.PdfViewerPreferenceFitWindow, True) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SetViewerPreference(PdfViewerPreference.PdfViewerPreferenceHideWindowUI, True) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_SetViewerPreference_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("SetViewerPreference failed. status : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("SetViewerPreference failed. status : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetViewerPreference(GdPicture12.PdfViewerPreference)
member.summary: Gets information about an option, controlling the way the document is to be presented on the screen or in print in Adobe viewers.
member.param: A member of the PdfViewerPreference enumeration.
member.returns: True if the option is enabled else false.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Displaying viewer preferences.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PreferenceFound As Boolean If oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerPreference(PdfViewerPreference.PdfViewerPreferenceCenterWindow) = True Then MessageBox.Show("The position the document's window is in the center of the screen.") PreferenceFound = True End If If oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerPreference(PdfViewerPreference.PdfViewerPreferenceDisplayDocTitle) = True Then MessageBox.Show("The window's title bar should display the document title.") PreferenceFound = True End If If oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerPreference(PdfViewerPreference.PdfViewerPreferenceFitWindow) = True Then MessageBox.Show("The document's window will be resized to fit the size of the first displayed page.") PreferenceFound = True End If If oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerPreference(PdfViewerPreference.PdfViewerPreferenceHideMenubar) = True Then MessageBox.Show("The viewer application's menu bar will be hidden when the document is active.") PreferenceFound = True End If If oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerPreference(PdfViewerPreference.PdfViewerPreferenceHideToolbar) = True Then MessageBox.Show("The viewer application's tool bars will be hidden when the document is active.") PreferenceFound = True End If If oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerPreference(PdfViewerPreference.PdfViewerPreferenceHideWindowUI) = True Then MessageBox.Show("User interface elements in the document's window (such as scroll bars and navigation controls) will be hidden, leaving only the document's contents displayed") PreferenceFound = True End If If PreferenceFound = False Then MessageBox.Show("No viewer preferences") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SetViewerPageMode(GdPicture12.PdfViewerPageMode)
member.summary: Sets the document's page mode, specifying how the document should be displayed when opened in Adobe viewers.
member.param: A member of the PdfViewerPageMode enumeration.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Setting the viewer page mode to full screen.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SetViewerPageMode(PdfViewerPageMode.PdfViewerPageModeFullScreen) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_SetViewerPageMode_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("SetViewerPageMode failed. status : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetViewerPageMode
member.summary: Gets the document's page mode, specifying how the document should be displayed when opened in Adobe viewers.
member.returns: A member of the PdfViewerPageMode enumeration.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Showing how the document should be displayed when opened.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PdfViewerPageMode As PdfViewerPageMode = oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerPageMode() Select Case PdfViewerPageMode Case PdfViewerPageMode.PdfViewerPageModeFullScreen MessageBox.Show("Full-screen mode, with no menu bar, window controls, or any other window visible") Case PdfViewerPageMode.PdfViewerPageModeUseAttachments MessageBox.Show("(PDF 1.6) Attachments panel visible") Case PdfViewerPageMode.PdfViewerPageModeUseNone MessageBox.Show("Neither document outline nor thumbnail images are visible") Case PdfViewerPageMode.PdfViewerPageModeUseOC MessageBox.Show("(PDF 1.5) Optional content group panel is visible") Case PdfViewerPageMode.PdfViewerPageModeUseOutlines MessageBox.Show("Document outline is visible") Case PdfViewerPageMode.PdfViewerPageModeUseThumbs MessageBox.Show("Thumbnail images is visible") Case Else MessageBox.Show("GetViewerPageMode_func method has failed") End Select Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SetViewerNonFullScreenPageMode(GdPicture12.PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode)
member.summary: Specifies the document's page mode, specifying how to display the document on exiting full-screen mode in Adobe viewers. This option is meaningful only if the value returned by the GetViewerPageMode() method is PdfViewerPageModeFullScreen. It is ignored otherwise.
member.param: A member of the PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode enumeration.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Showing thumbs when the screen page mode is not set to full.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SetViewerPageMode(PdfViewerPageMode.PdfViewerPageModeFullScreen) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SetViewerNonFullScreenPageMode(PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode.PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageModeUseThumbs) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_SetViewerNonFullScreenPageMode_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("SetViewerNonFullScreenPageMode failed. status : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("SetViewerPageMode failed. status : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetViewerNonFullScreenPageMode
member.summary: Gets the document's page mode, specifying how to display the document on exiting full-screen mode in Adobe viewers.
member.returns: A member of the PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode enumeration.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Retrieving the document's page mode.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode As PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode = oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerNonFullScreenPageMode() Select Case PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode Case PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode.PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageModeUseNone MessageBox.Show("Neither document outline nor thumbnail images are visible") Case PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode.PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageModeUseOC MessageBox.Show("Optional content group panel is visible") Case PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode.PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageModeUseOutlines MessageBox.Show("Document outline is visible") Case PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageMode.PdfViewerNonFullScreenPageModeUseThumbs MessageBox.Show("Thumbnail images are visible") Case Else MessageBox.Show("GetViewerNonFullScreenPageMode_func method has failed") End Select Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetViewerLayoutMode
member.summary: Gets the document's layout mode, specifying the page layout to be used when the document is opened in Adobe viewers.
member.returns: A member of the PdfViewerLayoutMode enumeration.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Retrieving the PDF\s layout mode.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PdfViewerLayoutMode As PdfViewerLayoutMode = oGdPicturePDF.GetViewerLayoutMode() Select Case PdfViewerLayoutMode Case PdfViewerLayoutMode.PdfViewerLayoutModeOneColumn MessageBox.Show("this PDF displays the pages in one column") Case PdfViewerLayoutMode.PdfViewerLayoutModeSinglePage MessageBox.Show("this PDF displays one page at a time") Case PdfViewerLayoutMode.PdfViewerLayoutModeTwoColumnLeft MessageBox.Show("this PDF displays the pages in two columns, with odd-numbered pages on the left") Case PdfViewerLayoutMode.PdfViewerLayoutModeTwoColumnRight MessageBox.Show("this PDF displays the pages in two columns, with odd-numbered pages on the right") Case PdfViewerLayoutMode.PdfViewerLayoutModeTwoPageLeft MessageBox.Show("this PDF displays the pages two at a time, with odd-numbered pages on the left") Case PdfViewerLayoutMode.PdfViewerLayoutModeTwoColumnRight MessageBox.Show("this PDF displays the pages two at a time, with odd-numbered pages on the right") Case Else MessageBox.Show("GetViewerLayoutMode method has failed") End Select Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.EmbedFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Embed a file into the PDF.
member.param: The file of the file to embed.
The description of the file.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Embed a text file into a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim FileName As String = Dir("*.txt") If FileName = "" Then MessageBox.Show("No text file on C:\") Else status = oGdPicturePDF.EmbedFile("" + FileName, "Title for " + FileName, "full description of the file") If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_EmbedFile_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("EmbedFile method failed. status : " + status.ToString()) End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

code.description: Retrieving the description of the first file embedded into the PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim EmbeddedFileCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetEmbeddedFileCount() If EmbeddedFileCount = 0 Then MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not contain embedded files") Else MessageBox.Show("The embedded files description : " + oGdPicturePDF.GetEmbeddedFileDescription(0)) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.ExtractEmbeddedFile(System.Int32,System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Gets the uncompressed content a file embedded into the PDF.
member.param: The file index (0-based). Must be a value between 0 and GetEmbeddedFileCount() -1.
Output parameter. An array of byte containing the embedded file data.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Extracting the first file embedded into a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim EmbeddedFileCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetEmbeddedFileCount() If EmbeddedFileCount = 0 Then MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not contain embedded files") Else Dim FileName As String = oGdPicturePDF.GetEmbeddedFileName(0) Dim FileSize As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetEmbeddedFileSize(0) Dim FileData(FileSize) As Byte status = oGdPicturePDF.ExtractEmbeddedFile(0, FileData) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim oFileStream As System.IO.FileStream oFileStream = New System.IO.FileStream("" + FileName + ".dat", System.IO.FileMode.Create) oFileStream.Write(FileData, 0, FileData.Length) oFileStream.Close() MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("ExtractEmbeddedFile method failed") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.DeleteEmbeddedFile(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes an embedded file from the PDF.
member.param: The file index (0-based). Must be a value between 0 and GetEmbeddedFileCount() -1.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Deleting first embedded file into a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim EmbeddedFileCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetEmbeddedFileCount() If EmbeddedFileCount = 0 Then MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not contain embedded files") Else status = oGdPicturePDF.DeleteEmbeddedFile(0) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_DeleteEmbeddedFile_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DeleteEmbeddedFile method failed") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SaveToFile(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the PDF document to a file.
member.param: The path to save the document. If the specified file already exists the component will try to overwrite it. You can overwrite the currently opened file but only if the document has been loaded in memory (see LoadInMemory parameter of the loading methods).
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: How to compress and pack an existing PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.EnableCompression(True) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Compressed.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Compressed_Pack.pdf", True) oGdPicturePDF.EnableCompression(False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_UnCompressed.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_UnCompressed_Pack.pdf", True) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Crypt.pdf", PdfEncryption.PdfEncryption40BitRC4, "toto", "titi", True, True, False, True, True, False, False, True) oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

code.description: How to compress and pack an existing PDF.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SaveToFile(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the PDF document to a file.
member.param: The path to save the document. If the specified file already exists the component will try to overwrite it. You can overwrite the currently opened file but only if the document has been loaded in memory (see LoadInMemory parameter of the loading methods).
Specifies if the library have to pack the produced document to reduce its size. If true, the saving process can be slower with some documents.

code.description: How to compress and pack existing PDF.

code.description: How to compress and pack existing PDF.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SaveToFile(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the PDF document to a file.
member.param: The path to save the document. If the specified file already exists the component will try to overwrite it. You can overwrite the currently opened file but only if the document has been loaded in memory (see LoadInMemory parameter of the loading methods).
Specifies if the library have to pack the produced document to reduce its size. If true, the saving process can be slower with some documents.

Set True to enable Fast Web View mode. Linearization shuffles the contents of the PDF file to place all of the information needed to display the first page near the beginning of the file. This allows the user to see the first page while the remainder of the file is still downloading from the web.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: How to compress, linearize and pack existing PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.EnableCompression(True) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Compressed.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Compressed_Pack.pdf", True) oGdPicturePDF.EnableCompression(False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_UnCompressed.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_UnCompressed_Pack.pdf", True) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Crypt.pdf", PdfEncryption.PdfEncryption40BitRC4, "toto", "titi", True, True, False, True, True, False, False, True) oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

code.description: How to compress, linearize and pack existing PDF.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SaveToFile(System.String,GdPicture12.PdfEncryption,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the PDF document to a file with encryption. Encryption is not allowed for PDF/A.
member.param: The path to save the document. If the specified file already exists the component will try to overwrite it. You can overwrite the currently opened file but only if the document has been loaded in memory (see LoadInMemory parameter of the loading methods).
The encryption scheme to use.
The user password for the PDF. Can be an empty string.
The owner password for the PDF. Can be an empty string.
Allows the user to print the document. Ignored if EncryptionScheme is set to PdfEncryption.PdfEncryptionNone.
Allows the user to copy text and graphics from the document. Ignored if EncryptionScheme is set to PdfEncryption.PdfEncryptionNone.
Allows the user to edit the document. Ignored if EncryptionScheme is set to PdfEncryption.PdfEncryptionNone.
Allows the user to add annotations. Ignored if EncryptionScheme is set to PdfEncryption.PdfEncryptionNone.
Allows the user to fill in form fields. Only works with 128-bit encryption.
Enables copying for use with accessibility features. Only works with 128-bit encryption.
Allows the user to assemble the document. Only works with 128-bit encryption.
Allows high resolution printing of the document. Only works with 128-bit encryption.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: How to compress, linearize , pack and crypt existing PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.EnableCompression(True) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Compressed.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Compressed_Pack.pdf", True) oGdPicturePDF.EnableCompression(False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_UnCompressed.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_UnCompressed_Pack.pdf", True) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_Crypt.pdf", PdfEncryption.PdfEncryption40BitRC4, "toto", "titi", True, True, False, True, True, False, False, True) oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SaveToFileInc(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the PDF document to a file, using incremental updates. Incremental saving (or incremental updates) produces fast save and document content persistence but produces bigger files than standard saving. This method must be used on non-encrypted documents only! We suggest to use this method only if you are doing small modification on large documents. IE: rotating a page for swapping some pages. From PDF References: The contents of a PDF file can be updated incrementally without rewriting the entire file. Changes are appended to the end of the file, leaving its original contents intact. The main advantage to updating a file in this way is that small changes to a large document can be saved quickly.
member.param: The path to save the document. If the specified file already exists the component will try to overwrite it. You can overwrite the currently opened file but only if the document has been loaded using the LoadFromFileEx() method.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Merging two documents using incremental saving. This way helps to reduce memory usage and dramatically increase performance during the merging process.

example.code: Dim oSrcPDF As New GdPicturePDF Dim oDstPDF As New GdPicturePDF oDstPDF.LoadFromFileEx("doc1.pdf", True) oSrcPDF.LoadFromFile("doc2.pdf", False) Dim srcPageCount As Integer = oSrcPDF.GetPageCount() For i As Integer = 1 To srcPageCount oDstPDF.ClonePage(oSrcPDF, i) Next oDstPDF.SaveToFileInc("doc1.pdf") oDstPDF.Dispose() oSrcPDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SaveToStreamInc(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the PDF document to a stream, using incremental updates. Incremental saving (or incremental updates) produces fast save and document content persistence but produces bigger files than standard saving. This method must be used on non-encrypted documents only! We suggest to use this method only if you are doing small modification on large documents. IE: rotating a page for swapping some pages. From PDF References: The contents of a PDF file can be updated incrementally without rewriting the entire file. Changes are appended to the end of the file, leaving its original contents intact. The main advantage to updating a file in this way is that small changes to a large document can be saved quickly.
member.param: The stream to save the document.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Loading a pdf, cloning the first page at the end and then saving it incrementally on a stream.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) oGdPicturePDF.DuplicatePage(1) Dim oFileStream As System.IO.FileStream oFileStream = New System.IO.FileStream("test_SaveIncToStream.pdf", System.IO.FileMode.Create) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToStreamInc(oFileStream) oFileStream.Close() MessageBox.Show("Ok") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SaveToStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the PDF document to a stream.
member.param: The stream to save the document.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Loading a PDF and saving it to a stream with compression.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim oFileStream As System.IO.FileStream oFileStream = New System.IO.FileStream("test_SaveToStream.pdf", System.IO.FileMode.Create) oGdPicturePDF.EnableCompression(True) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToStream(oFileStream) oFileStream.Close() MessageBox.Show("Ok") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.EnableCompression(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines if the PDF engine must compress PDFs during saving operation (compressed by default).

code.description: Compressing a PDF.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.DigiSign(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Saves and applies digital signature to the PDF. This method generate an Adobe.PPKLite signature (adbe.pkcs7.detached). Warning: This method automatically closes the PDF document.
member.param: The path to save to PDF.
The path of the digital certificate to use. Must be PKCS#12 certificate (.PFX, .P12).
The certificate password.
The reason of the signature. Can be an empty string.
The location where the signature is applied. Can be an empty string.
Information about the signer. Can be an empty string.
The signer name. If empty, "GdPicture" will be used.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Applying digital signature to an existing document

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) oGdPicturePDF.DigiSign("signed.pdf", "test.pfx", "certificat_password", "The Reason", "The Location", "The Contact Info", "The Signer Name") oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.summary: Saves and applies digital signature with a visible stamp to the PDF. This method generate an Adobe.PPKLite signature (adbe.pkcs7.detached). Linearization can be applied. Warning: This method automatically closes the PDF document.
member.param: The path to save to PDF.
The path of the digital certificate to use. Must be PKCS#12 certificate (.PFX, .P12).
The certificate password.
The reason of the signature. Can be an empty string.
The location where the signature is applied. Can be an empty string.
Information about the signer. Can be an empty string.
The signer name. If empty, "GdPicture" will be used.
The image resource name (the stamp) previously returned by the AddImageFromBitmap, AddImageFromGdPictureImage or GetPageImageResName method.
The X destination of the bottom left corner of the stamp in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.

Width of the stamp, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
Height of the stamp, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
Specifies if a validation mark must be rendered over the signature field.
Defines the text to be rendered over the signature field. Multiline text can be used.

Set True to enable Fast Web View mode. Linearization shuffles the contents of the PDF file to place all of the information needed to display the first page near the beginning of the file. This allows the user to see the first page while the remainder of the file is still downloading from the web.
member.remarks: Take care: DstX and DstY parameters are the coordinates on the bottom-left corner of the image!

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetSignatureCount
member.summary: Returns the number of applied digital signature to the document.
member.returns: The number of applied digital signatures.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Counting signatures in a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim SignatureCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetSignatureCount() If SignatureCount > 0 Then MessageBox.Show("This PDF contains " + SignatureCount.ToString()) Else MessageBox.Show("This PDF does not contain a signature") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.summary: Gets information about a digital signature in the document. This method also check the certificate validity and if the document has been altered or corrupted since it was signed.
member.param: The signature index. Must be a value in the range 0 - GetSignatureCount() - 1.
Returns the name of the person or authority signing the document. Can be an empty string.
Returns the reason for the signing, such as ( I agree ). Can be an empty string.
Returns the CPU host name or physical location of the signing. Can be an empty string.
Returns information provided by the signer to enable a recipient to contact the signer to verify the signature; for example, a phone number. Can be an empty string.

Returns the time of signing as string. Depending on the signature handler, this may be a normal unverified computer time or a time generated in a verifiable way from a secure time server. Can be an empty string.

Returns the left position, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method, in the current coordinate space defined by the SetOrigin() method, of the associated stamp. Can be 0 if no stamp has been applied.

Returns the top position, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method, in the current coordinate space defined by the SetOrigin() method, of the associated stamp. Can be 0 if no stamp has been applied.
Returns the width, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method, of the associated stamp. Can be 0 if no stamp has been applied.
Returns the height, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method, of the associated stamp. Can be 0 if no stamp has been applied.
Returns the page number including the associated stamp. Can be 0 if no stamp has been applied.
Returns if the document has been altered or corrupted since it was signed.
Returns of the certificate has been successfully verified.
Returns the associated alias of the certificate.
Returns the name of the authority that issued the certificate.
Returns the date in local time on which the certificate become valid.
Returns the date in local time after which the certificate is no longer valid.
Returns the subject distinguished name of the certificate.
Returns the certificate version.
Returns the date and time that the message was signed.
A member of the PdfSignatureCertificationLevel enumeration.
member.remarks: This method supports only adbe.pkcs7.sha1 and adbe.pkcs7.detached subfilters. adbe.x509.rsa.sha1 will be supported in a future release.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Showing the signature information of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim SignatureCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetSignatureCount() If SignatureCount > 0 Then For SignatureNum As Integer = 0 To SignatureCount - 1 Dim SignatureName As String Dim SignatureReason As String Dim SignatureLocation As String Dim SignatureContactInfo As String Dim SignatureDate As String Dim StampLeft As Single Dim StampTop As Single Dim StampWidth As Single Dim StampHeight As Single Dim StampPage As Integer Dim DocumentValid As Boolean Dim CertificateValid As Boolean Dim CertificateFriendlyName As String Dim CertificateIssuer As String Dim CertificateNotBefore As DateTime Dim CertificateNotAfter As DateTime Dim CertificateSubject As String Dim CertificateVersion As Integer Dim SigningTime As DateTime Dim sigLevel As PdfSignatureCertificationLevel oGdPicturePDF.GetSignatureProperties(SignatureNum, SignatureName, SignatureReason, SignatureLocation, SignatureContactInfo, SignatureDate, StampLeft, StampTop, StampWidth, StampHeight, StampPage, DocumentValid, CertificateValid, CertificateFriendlyName, CertificateIssuer, CertificateNotBefore, CertificateNotAfter, CertificateSubject, CertificateVersion, SigningTime, sigLevel) Dim SignatureInfo As String If StampWidth = 0 Or StampHeight = 0 Then SignatureInfo = "Invisble signature" Else SignatureInfo = "Signature at (" + StampLeft.ToString() + "*" + StampTop.ToString() + ")-(" + StampWidth.ToString() + "*" + StampHeight.ToString() + ")" End If If DocumentValid Then SignatureInfo = SignatureInfo + vbCrLf + "The document has not been changed" Else SignatureInfo = SignatureInfo + vbCrLf + "The document has been changed" End If If CertificateValid Then SignatureInfo = SignatureInfo + vbCrLf + "The signature is valid" Else SignatureInfo = SignatureInfo + vbCrLf + "The signature is not valid" End If SignatureInfo = SignatureInfo + vbCrLf + "at page " + StampPage.ToString() + vbCrLf + vbCrLf + "SignatureName : " + SignatureName + vbCrLf + "SignatureReason : " + SignatureReason + vbCrLf + "SignatureLocation : " + SignatureLocation + vbCrLf + "SignatureContactInfo : " + SignatureContactInfo + vbCrLf + "SignatureDate : " + SignatureDate.ToString() + vbCrLf + vbCrLf MessageBox.Show(SignatureInfo, "Signature number" + SignatureNum.ToString()) Next Else MessageBox.Show("This PDF does not contain a signature") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetFontCount
member.summary: Returns the number of fonts used by the PDF.
member.returns: The number of fonts used.

code.description: List all fonts and their attributes used by a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim FontCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetFontCount() If FontCount > 0 Then Dim FontList As String = "" For x As Integer = 0 To FontCount - 1 Dim FontAtribs As String = oGdPicturePDF.GetFontName(x + 1) + " | " + oGdPicturePDF.GetFontType(x + 1) + " | " + oGdPicturePDF.GetFontEncoding(x + 1) FontList = FontList + FontAtribs + vbCrLf Next MessageBox.Show(FontList) Else MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not contain fonts") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.AddTrueTypeFont(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a TrueType system font to the PDF. Only ANSI characters will be supported by using the added font.
member.param: The name of the font to add.
True to set the font bold else False.
True to set the font italic else False.
True to embed the font in the PDF as TrueType, else False. Warning: embedding the font to the file produces larger document.
member.returns: Returns a Font resource name if success, else an empty string. The Font resource name can be subsequently used with DrawText(), DrawTextUnderLine(), DrawTextBox() and other methods taking a font resource name as parameter.

code.description: Adding a TrueType system font to the pdf, then using it to draw some text on the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim FontResName As String = oGdPicturePDF.AddTrueTypeFont("Times new Roman", False, False, False) If FontResName = "" Then MessageBox.Show("Unknown truetype system font") Else oGdPicturePDF.SetMeasurementUnit(PdfMeasurementUnit.PdfMeasurementUnitMillimeter) oGdPicturePDF.SetOrigin(PdfOrigin.PdfOriginTopLeft) oGdPicturePDF.SetTextSize(30) status = oGdPicturePDF.DrawText(FontResName, 10, 10, "Here is some text") If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_AddTrueTypeFont_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DrawText method failed") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not have a first page", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.AddTrueTypeFontU(System.String,GdPicture12.FontCharSet,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a TrueType system font to the PDF. Unicode characters drawing will be supported by using the added font.
member.param: The name of the font to add.
A member of the FontCharSet enumeration. Defines the character encoding system to use.
True to set the font bold else False.
True to set the font italic else False.
member.returns: Returns a Font resource name if success, else an empty string. The Font resource name can be subsequently used with DrawText(), DrawTextUnderLine(), DrawTextBox() and other methods taking a font resource name as parameter.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Adding a TrueType system font to the PDF, then using it to draw some unicode text on the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim FontResName As String = oGdPicturePDF.AddTrueTypeFontU("MingLiu", FontCharSet.ANSI_CHARSET, False, False) If FontResName = "" Then MessageBox.Show("Font file not found") Else oGdPicturePDF.SetMeasurementUnit(PdfMeasurementUnit.PdfMeasurementUnitMillimeter) oGdPicturePDF.SetOrigin(PdfOrigin.PdfOriginTopLeft) oGdPicturePDF.SetTextSize(30) status = oGdPicturePDF.DrawText(FontResName, 10, 10, ChrW(20320) + ChrW(22909)) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_AddTrueTypeFontU_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DrawText method failed") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not have a first page", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.AddTrueTypeFontFromFile(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a TrueType font from a file to the PDF. Only ANSI characters will be supported by using the added font.
member.param: The path of the font file.
True to set the font bold else False.
True to set the font italic else False.
True to embed the font in the PDF as TrueType, else False. Warning: embedding the font to the file produces larger document.
member.returns: Returns a Font resource name if success, else an empty string. The Font resource name can be subsequently used with DrawText(), DrawTextUnderLine(), DrawTextBox() and other methods taking a font resource name as parameter.

code.description: Adding a TrueType font from a file to the PDF, then using it to draw some text on the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim FontResName As String = oGdPicturePDF.AddTrueTypeFontFromFile("windows\fonts\webdings.ttf", False, False, True) If FontResName = "" Then MessageBox.Show("truetype file font not found") Else oGdPicturePDF.SetMeasurementUnit(PdfMeasurementUnit.PdfMeasurementUnitMillimeter) oGdPicturePDF.SetOrigin(PdfOrigin.PdfOriginTopLeft) oGdPicturePDF.SetTextSize(30) status = oGdPicturePDF.DrawText(FontResName, 10, 10, "Here is some text") If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_AddTrueTypeFontFromFile_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DrawText method failed") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not have a first page", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.AddFontFromFileU(System.String,System.String,GdPicture12.FontCharSet,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a font from a file to the PDF. Unicode characters drawing will be supported by using the added font. Supported font files are: * .fon Font resource file. * .fnt Raw bitmap font file. * .ttf Raw TrueType file. * .ttc East Asian Windows: TrueType font collection. * .fot TrueType resource file. * .otf PostScript OpenType font. * .mmm multiple master Type1 font resource file. It must be used with .pfm and .pfb files. * .pfb Type 1 font bits file. It is used with a .pfm file. * .pfm Type 1 font metrics file. It is used with a .pfb file.
member.param: The path of the font file. To add a font whose information comes from several resource files, defines string with the file names separated by a | --for example, abcxxxxx.pfm | abcxxxxx.pfb.
The name of the font. IE: Arial.
A member of the FontCharSet enumeration. Defines the character encoding system to use.
True to set the font bold else False.
True to set the font italic else False.
member.returns: Returns a Font resource name if success, else an empty string. The Font resource name can be subsequently used with DrawText(), DrawTextUnderLine(), DrawTextBox() and other methods taking a font resource name as parameter.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Adding a font from a file to the PDF, then using it to draw some unicode text on the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim FontResName As String = oGdPicturePDF.AddFontFromFileU("WINDOWS\Fonts\mingliu.ttc", "MingLiu", FontCharSet.ANSI_CHARSET, False, False) If FontResName = "" Then MessageBox.Show("Font file not found") Else oGdPicturePDF.SetMeasurementUnit(PdfMeasurementUnit.PdfMeasurementUnitMillimeter) oGdPicturePDF.SetOrigin(PdfOrigin.PdfOriginTopLeft) oGdPicturePDF.SetTextSize(30) status = oGdPicturePDF.DrawText(FontResName, 10, 10, ChrW(20320) + ChrW(22909)) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_AddFontFromFileU_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DrawText method failed") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not have a first page", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.AddStandardFont(GdPicture12.PdfStandardFont)
member.summary: Adds a standard font (Standard Type 1 Fonts (Standard 14 Fonts)) to the PDF.
member.param: The standard font to add. A member of the PdfStandardFont enumeration.
member.returns: Returns a Font resource name if success, else an empty string. The Font resource name can be subsequently used with DrawText(), DrawTextUnderLine(), DrawTextBox() and other methods taking a font resource name as parameter.

code.description: Adding a standard font to the PDF, then using it to draw some text on the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim FontResName As String = oGdPicturePDF.AddStandardFont(PdfStandardFont.PdfStandardFontHelvetica) If FontResName = "" Then MessageBox.Show("Unknown standard font") Else oGdPicturePDF.SetMeasurementUnit(PdfMeasurementUnit.PdfMeasurementUnitMillimeter) oGdPicturePDF.SetOrigin(PdfOrigin.PdfOriginTopLeft) oGdPicturePDF.SetTextSize(30) status = oGdPicturePDF.DrawText(FontResName, 10, 10, "Here is some text") If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_AddStandardFont_func.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DrawText method failed") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("This pdf does not have a first page", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetPageLabel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns, if any, the label associated to a specific page of the PDF.
member.param: The page number. Should be a value between 1 and GetPageCount(). If the specified parameter is out of range, the nereast page will be automatically selected.
member.returns: The page label.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Getting the page label for each page of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then 'remove existing page-labels-range if any Dim pageLabelsRangeCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRangeCount() If pageLabelsRangeCount > 0 Then Dim pageLabels As String = "" For pageNum As Integer = 1 To PageCount pageLabels = pageLabels + "Page " + pageNum.ToString() + " Label = <<" + oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabel(pageNum) + ">>" + vbCrLf Next MessageBox.Show(pageLabels) Else MessageBox.Show("This PDF does not contain PageLabels") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRangeCount
member.summary: Retunrs the number of the available labeling ranges in the PDF.
member.returns: The number of the available labeling ranges in the PDF.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Removing all page labels of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then 'remove existing pagelabelsrange if any Dim pageLabelsRangeCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRangeCount() If pageLabelsRangeCount > 0 Then status = oGdPicturePDF.DeletePageLabels() If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_DeletePageLabels.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DeletePageLabels failed :" + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("This PDF does not contain PageLabels") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If oGdPicturePDF.Dispose()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.AddPageLabelsRange(System.Int32,GdPicture12.PdfPageLabelStyle,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a new labeling range in the PDF. A labeling range is a series of consecutive pages using the same numbering system.
member.param: The starting page in the labeling range. Must be a value between 1 and GetPageCount().
A member of the PdfPageLabelStyle enumeration. Defines the page labeling style.
The label prefix for page labels in this range. Can be an empty string.
The value of the numeric portion for the first page label in the range. Subsequent pages are numbered sequentially from this value, which must be greater than or equal to 1. Default value: 1.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Adding a roman page labels on the first page of a PDF, starting at number 50.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then 'remove existing pagelabelsrange if any Dim pageLabelsRangeCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRangeCount() If pageLabelsRangeCount > 0 Then For pageLabelsRangeNum As Integer = pageLabelsRangeCount - 1 To 0 Step -1 status = oGdPicturePDF.DeletePageLabelsRange(pageLabelsRangeNum) Next End If status = oGdPicturePDF.AddPageLabelsRange(1, PdfPageLabelStyle.PdfPageLabelStyleUppercaseRomanNumerals, "Roman Label : ", 50) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_AddPageLabelsRange.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("AddPageLabelsRange failed :" + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF do not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRange(System.Int32,System.Int32@,GdPicture12.PdfPageLabelStyle@,System.String@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Returns properties of a specific page labeling range of the PDF.
member.param: The labeling range, must be a value between 0 and GetPageLabelsRangeCount() - 1.
Returns the starting page in the labeling range.
A member of the PdfPageLabelStyle enumeration. Defines the page labeling style.
Returns the label prefix for page labels in this range. Can be an empty string.
Returns the value of the numeric portion for the first page label in the range. Subsequent pages are numbered sequentially from this value, which must be greater than or equal to 1. Default value: 1.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Retrieving information about each page label in a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then 'remove existing pagelabelsrange if any Dim pageLabelsRangeCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRangeCount() If pageLabelsRangeCount > 0 Then For pageLabelsNum = 0 To pageLabelsRangeCount - 1 Dim PageLabelsStartPage As Integer Dim PageLabelsStyle As PdfPageLabelStyle Dim PageLabelsPrefix As String = "" Dim PageLabelNumPortion As Integer status = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRange(pageLabelsNum, PageLabelsStartPage, PageLabelsStyle, PageLabelsPrefix, PageLabelNumPortion) MessageBox.Show("Start at page " + PageLabelsStartPage.ToString() + vbCrLf + "Style : " + PageLabelsStyle.ToString() + vbCrLf + "Prefix : " + PageLabelsPrefix + vbCrLf + "PartNum :" + PageLabelNumPortion.ToString(), "PageLabel number " + pageLabelsNum.ToString()) Next Else MessageBox.Show("This PDF does not contain PageLabels") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.DeletePageLabels
member.summary: Removes all page labels of the PDF.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Removing all page labels of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then 'remove existing pagelabelsrange if any Dim pageLabelsRangeCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRangeCount() If pageLabelsRangeCount > 0 Then status = oGdPicturePDF.DeletePageLabels() If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_DeletePageLabels.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DeletePageLabels failed :" + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("This PDF does not contain PageLabels") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.DeletePageLabelsRange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a specific page labeling range of the PDF.
member.param: The labeling range, must be a value between 0 and GetPageLabelsRangeCount() - 1.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Adding a roman page labels on the first page of a PDF, stating at number 50.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then 'remove existing page-labels-range if any Dim pageLabelsRangeCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRangeCount() If pageLabelsRangeCount > 0 Then For pageLabelsRangeNum As Integer = pageLabelsRangeCount - 1 To 0 Step -1 status = oGdPicturePDF.DeletePageLabelsRange(pageLabelsRangeNum) Next End If status = oGdPicturePDF.AddPageLabelsRange(1, PdfPageLabelStyle.PdfPageLabelStyleUppercaseRomanNumerals, "Roman Label : ", 50) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_AddPageLabelsRange.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("AddPageLabelsRange failed :" + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SetPageLabelsRangeStartPage(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Modifies the starting page of a labeling range of the PDF.
member.param: The labeling range, must be a value between 0 and GetPageLabelsRangeCount() - 1.
The starting page in the labeling range. Must be a value between 1 and GetPageCount().
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Changing the starting page of the first page labels range in the last page, removing other page labels range in a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() 'Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then 'remove existing pagelabelsrange if any Dim pageLabelsRangeCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageLabelsRangeCount() If pageLabelsRangeCount > 0 Then For pageLabelsRangeNum As Integer = pageLabelsRangeCount - 1 To 1 Step -1 oGdPicturePDF.DeletePageLabelsRange(pageLabelsRangeNum) Next oGdPicturePDF.SetPageLabelsRangeStartPage(0, PageCount) oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_SetPageLabels.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("This PDF does not contain PageLabels") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.ClearPageContent
member.summary: Empties the content of the selected page. This will result in a blank page with the same dimensions.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Clearing the first page of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then If oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() > 0 Then oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) status = oGdPicturePDF.ClearPageContent() If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_ClearPageContent.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("ClearPageContent failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.NewPage(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds a new page to the PDF.
member.param: Width in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
Height in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.
member.remarks: The newly created page in the document is automatically selected after the operation.

code.description: Create a new page at the end of the pdf with the same dimensions and rotation as the first page. Then delete the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then If oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() > 1 Then 'more than one page oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) Dim PageRotation As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageRotation() Dim PageHeight As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageHeight() Dim PageWidth As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageWidth() oGdPicturePDF.NewPage(PageWidth, PageHeight) oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount()) oGdPicturePDF.RotatePage(PageRotation) status = oGdPicturePDF.DeletePage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_DeletePage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DeletePage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.NewPage(GdPicture12.PdfPageSizes)
member.summary: Adds a new page to the PDF.
member.param: A member of the PdfPageSizes enumeration. The predefined page size.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.
member.remarks: The newly created page in the document is automatically selected after the operation.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.ResizePage(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Resize a page page of the PDF.
member.param: The new page width in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
The new page height in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Resize the first page of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then If oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() > 0 Then oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) Dim PageHeight As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageHeight() Dim PageWidth As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageWidth() status = oGdPicturePDF.ResizePage(PageWidth * 110 / 100, PageHeight * 110 / 100) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_ResizePage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("ResizePage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.ScalePage(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Scale a page page of the PDF.
member.param: The horizontal scaling factor. For example 2.0 multiplies the width by 2, and 0.5 divides the width by 2.
The vertical scaling factor. For example 2.0 multiplies the height by 2, and 0.5 divides the height by 2.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Resize first page of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then If oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() > 0 Then oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) status = oGdPicturePDF.ScalePage(1.1, 1.1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_ScalePage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("ScalePage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.InsertPage(System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Insert a new page to the PDF.
member.param: Width in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
Height in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
The position of the page to insert. Must be a value between 1 and PageCount.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Insert a blank page before the last page of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) Dim PageHeight As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageHeight() Dim PageWidth As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageWidth() status = oGdPicturePDF.InsertPage(PageWidth, PageHeight, PageCount) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_InsertPage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("InsertPage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.InsertPage(GdPicture12.PdfPageSizes,System.Int32)
member.summary: Insert a new page to the PDF.
member.param: A member of the PdfPageSizes enumeration. The predefined page size.
The position of the page to insert. Must be a value between 1 and PageCount.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.ClonePage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Clones a specific page of the PDF to the last position.
member.param: The page number to clone. Must be a value between 1 and page count.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.
member.remarks: The newly created page in the document is automatically selected after the operation.

code.description: Cloning the first page, then cropping the clone page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.ClonePage(1) If status <> GdPictureStatus.OK Then MessageBox.Show("ClonePage method failed") Else oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount) Dim CropLeft, CropTop, CropRight, CropBottom As Single oGdPicturePDF.GetPageBox(PdfPageBox.PdfPageBoxMediaBox, CropLeft, CropTop, CropRight, CropBottom) status = oGdPicturePDF.SetPageBox(PdfPageBox.PdfPageBoxCropBox, CropLeft + 10, CropTop + 10, CropRight - 10, CropBottom - 10) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_ClonePage_func_2.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.ClonePage(GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clones a specific page from a specific PDF to the current PDF. Each cloned page is inserted at the end of the document. This method can be used to merge multiple PDFs together.
member.param: A GdPicturePDF object. The PDF source which contains the page to clone in the current PDF.
The page number to clone. Must be a value between 1 and source PDF page count.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.
member.remarks: The newly created page in the document is automatically selected after the operation.

code.description: Merging two PDFs.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF1 As New GdPicturePDF Dim oGdPicturePDF2 As New GdPicturePDF Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF1.LoadFromFile("test1.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF2.LoadFromFile("test2.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim oGdPictureNewPdf As New GdPicturePDF status = oGdPictureNewPdf.NewPDF() If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim NbPages = oGdPicturePDF1.GetPageCount() For Page As Integer = 1 To NbPages status = oGdPictureNewPdf.ClonePage(oGdPicturePDF1, Page) If status <> GdPictureStatus.OK Then MessageBox.Show("File 1, Error clonning page " + Page.ToString() + vbCrLf + "Status : " + status.ToString()) Exit For End If Next If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then NbPages = oGdPicturePDF2.GetPageCount() For Page As Integer = 1 To NbPages status = oGdPictureNewPdf.ClonePage(oGdPicturePDF2, Page) If status <> GdPictureStatus.OK Then MessageBox.Show("File 2, Error clonning page " + Page.ToString() + vbCrLf + "Status : " + status.ToString()) Exit For End If Next End If If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPictureNewPdf.SaveToFile("test_ClonePage_func_1.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("The second file can't be opened") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The first file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.DuplicatePage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Duplicates the current page of the PDF to a specific number of new pages maintaining its layer structure and content. The duplicate pages will be generated to the end of the document. This method is particularly useful for applying a common page header and footer while keeping the smallest file size.
member.param: The number of page to create.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.
member.remarks: The newly created page in the document is automatically selected after the operation.

code.description: Duplicate the first page of a pdf three times at the end of the pdf.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) status = oGdPicturePDF.DuplicatePage(3) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_DuplicatePage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DuplicatePage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.DeletePage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a page in the PDF.
member.param: The page number to delete. Must be a value between 1 and GetPageCount().
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Create a new page at the end of the pdf with the same dimensions and rotation of the first page. Then delete the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then If oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() > 1 Then 'more than one page oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) Dim PageRotation As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageRotation() Dim PageHeight As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageHeight() Dim PageWidth As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageWidth() oGdPicturePDF.NewPage(PageWidth, PageHeight) oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount()) oGdPicturePDF.RotatePage(PageRotation) status = oGdPicturePDF.DeletePage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_DeletePage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DeletePage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SwapPages(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Swaps 2 pages in the PDF.
member.param: The page to swap with Page2. Must be a value between 1 and GetPageCount().
The page to swap with Page1. Must be a value between 1 and GetPageCount().
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Swapping the first and last pages of a pdf.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then If PageCount > 1 Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SwapPages(1, PageCount) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_SwapPages.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("SwapPages failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The pdf must contain at least 2 pages") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.MovePage(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move a page in the PDF.
member.param: The page to move. Must be a value between 1 and GetPageCount().
The page destination. Must be a value between 1 and GetPageCount().
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Moving the first page of the pdf to become the second.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then If PageCount > 1 Then status = oGdPicturePDF.MovePage(1, 2) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_MovePage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("MovePage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The pdf must contain at least 2 pages for this sample") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetPageCount
member.summary: Returns the number of pages of the PDF.
member.returns: The number of pages of the PDF.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetPageWidth
member.summary: Returns the page width, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method, of the selected page of the PDF.
member.returns: The page width.

remarks.para: The returned value does not correspond to page rotation. If the page is rotate as a multiple of 90 degress, the original width prior to rotation will be returned.
Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Create a new page at the end of the pdf with the same dimensions and rotation as the first page. Then delete the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then If oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() > 1 Then 'more than one page oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) Dim PageRotation As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageRotation() Dim PageHeight As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageHeight() Dim PageWidth As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageWidth() oGdPicturePDF.NewPage(PageWidth, PageHeight) oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount()) oGdPicturePDF.RotatePage(PageRotation) status = oGdPicturePDF.DeletePage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_DeletePage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DeletePage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetPageHeight
member.summary: Returns the page height, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method, of the selected page of the PDF.
member.returns: The page height.

remarks.para: The returned value does not correspond to page rotation. If the page is rotate as a multiple of 90 degress, the original height prior to rotation will be returned.

code.description: Create a new page at the end of the pdf with the same dimensions and rotation as the first page. Then delete the first page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then If oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() > 1 Then 'more than one page oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) Dim PageRotation As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageRotation() Dim PageHeight As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageHeight() Dim PageWidth As Single = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageWidth() oGdPicturePDF.NewPage(PageWidth, PageHeight) oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount()) oGdPicturePDF.RotatePage(PageRotation) status = oGdPicturePDF.DeletePage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_DeletePage.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("DeletePage failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetPageBox(GdPicture12.PdfPageBox,System.Single@,System.Single@,System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Returns the bounds of the specified page box of the selected page of the PDF.

Returns the left position of the page box, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
Returns the top position of the page box, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
Returns the right position of the page box, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
Returns the bottom position of the page box, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Retrieving the position of the first page's media box in millimetres.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SetMeasurementUnit(PdfMeasurementUnit.PdfMeasurementUnitMillimeter) oGdPicturePDF.SetOrigin(PdfOrigin.PdfOriginTopLeft) Dim PageLeft, PageTop, PageRight, PageBottom As Single oGdPicturePDF.GetPageBox(PdfPageBox.PdfPageBoxMediaBox, PageLeft, PageTop, PageRight, PageBottom) MessageBox.Show("First page mediabox : (" + PageLeft.ToString() + " * " + PageTop.ToString() + ")-(" + PageRight.ToString() + "*" + PageBottom.ToString() + ") millimetres") Else MessageBox.Show("This PDF has no pages") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.summary: Defines the bounds of a page box of the selected page of the PDF.

The bottom position of the page box, in current unit defined by the SetMeasurementUnit() method.

code.description: Cloning the first page, then cropping the clone page.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then status = oGdPicturePDF.ClonePage(1) If status <> GdPictureStatus.OK Then MessageBox.Show("ClonePage method failed") Else oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount) Dim CropLeft, CropTop, CropRight, CropBottom As Single oGdPicturePDF.GetPageBox(PdfPageBox.PdfPageBoxMediaBox, CropLeft, CropTop, CropRight, CropBottom) status = oGdPicturePDF.SetPageBox(PdfPageBox.PdfPageBoxCropBox, CropLeft + 10, CropTop + 10, CropRight - 10, CropBottom - 10) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_ClonePage_func_2.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") End If End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SelectPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Selects a page of the PDF.
member.param: The page number. Should be a value between 1 and GetPageCount(). If the specified parameter is out of range, the nereast page will be automatically selected.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.
member.remarks: This method can fail with password protected document not previously unlocked, or on corrupted PDF.

code.description: Clearing the first page of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then If oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() > 0 Then oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(1) status = oGdPicturePDF.ClearPageContent() If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_ClearPageContent.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("ClearPageContent failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.GetCurrentPage
member.summary: Returns the current page of the PDF.
member.returns: The selected page number. A value between 1 and GetPageCount(). 0 if failed.
member.remarks: Use the GetStat() method to determine if this method failed.

code.description: Retrieving the current page number of a PDF.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then Dim CurrentPage As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetCurrentPage() MessageBox.Show("The current page number is " + CurrentPage.ToString()) Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.RotatePages(System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates clockwise all pages of the PDF by 90, 180 or 270 degrees.
member.param: Angle of rotation. Can be 90, -90, 180, -180, 270, -270 or any multiple of 90.
member.returns: The page rotation of the current page.

code.description: Rotating all pages of a PDF 90 degrees.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then status = oGdPicturePDF.RotatePages(90) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_RotatePages.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("RotatePages failed : " + status.ToString()) End If Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.NormalizePage
member.summary: Normalizes the current page in order to set the page's rotation to 0 and set the CropBox equal to the MediaBox.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.
member.remarks: This method should be used before starting drawing operations which need to ignore the page's rotation and cropping.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SetPageMetadata(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Metadata of the selected page of the PDF.
member.param: The metadata.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Setting the metadata for all pages of a pdf.

example.code: Dim oGdPicturePDF As New GdPicturePDF() Dim status As GdPictureStatus = oGdPicturePDF.LoadFromFile("test.pdf", False) If status = GdPictureStatus.OK Then Dim PageCount As Integer = oGdPicturePDF.GetPageCount() If PageCount > 0 Then Dim pageMetadata As String For pageNumber As Integer = 1 To PageCount oGdPicturePDF.SelectPage(pageNumber) pageMetadata = "<head>" + vbCrLf + "<meta name=" + Chr(34) + "description" + Chr(34) + " content=" + Chr(34) + "metadata inside pdf" + Chr(34) + ">" + vbCrLf + "<meta name=" + Chr(34) + "keywords" + Chr(34) + " content=" + Chr(34) + "page metadatas" + Chr(34) + ">" + vbCrLf + "<meta name=" + Chr(34) + "author" + Chr(34) + " content=" + Chr(34) + "John Doe" + Chr(34) + ">" + vbCrLf + "<meta name=" + Chr(34) + "pagenumber" + Chr(34) + " content=" + Chr(34) + pageNumber.ToString() + ">" + vbCrLf + "<meta Chrset=" + Chr(34) + "UTF-8" + Chr(34) + ">" + vbCrLf + "</head>" oGdPicturePDF.SetPageMetadata(pageMetadata) Next oGdPicturePDF.SaveToFile("test_SetPageMeta.pdf", False) MessageBox.Show("Ok") Else MessageBox.Show("The PDF does not contain pages", "Error") End If Else MessageBox.Show("The file can't be opened") End If

member.summary: Sets the Metadata of the selected page of the PDF.

member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPicturePDF.SetPagePrivateTag(System.String,System.String)
