member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainEnableMemoryTransferMode(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies if the memory transfer mode shoud be used during acquisition processes.
member.param: True to enable memory transfer mode, False otherwise. Default value is False.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Acquires a single image, from the currently selected Data Source.
member.remarks: If success, set the created GdPicture Image as a GdPicture image. By default, the default data source (DS) is opened, displays its dialog, and determines all the parameters of the acquisition and transfer. If you want to (try to) hide the DS dialog, see TwainSetHideUI. Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. To set the TWAIN state to 4, use the TwainOpenDefaultSource() or TwainOpenSource() method.
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: 0: The image could not created. Use the GetStat(), TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error. Non-zero: GdPicture Image Identifier. The created image. The ReleaseGdPictureImage() method must be subsequently used to release the image from the memory.

code.description: Acquire multiple image from the document feeder to a multipage tiff image

example.code: Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim ImageID As Integer Dim bContinue As Boolean = True Dim MultipageHandle As Integer Dim ImageCount As Integer oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoFeed(True) 'Enable AutoFeed oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoScan(True) 'To achieve the maximum scanning rate oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetPixelType(TwainPixelType.TWPT_BW) '1 bit bw image oGdPictureImaging.TwainEnableDuplex(True) 'Duplex acquisition if supported oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetHideUI(True) 'Asks to the device to hide his GUI ImageCount = 0 Do ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(Me.Handle) If imageId <> 0 Then ImageCount = ImageCount + 1 If ImageCount = 1 Then MultipageHandle = ImageID oGdPictureImaging.TiffSaveAsMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle, "multipage.tif", TiffCompression.TiffCompressionAUTO) Else oGdPictureImaging.TiffAddToMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle, ImageID) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If End If Loop While oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetState() > TwainStatus.TWAIN_SOURCE_ENABLED oGdPictureImaging.TiffCloseMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(MultipageHandle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Acquires a single image, from the currently selected Data Source.
member.remarks: If success, set the created GdPicture Image as a GdPicture image. By default, the default data source (DS) is opened, displays its dialog, and determines all the parameters of the acquisition and transfer. If you want to (try to) hide the DS dialog, see TwainSetHideUI. Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. To set the TWAIN state to 4, use the TwainOpenDefaultSource() or TwainOpenSource() method.
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: 0: The image could not created. Use the GetStat(), TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error. Non-zero: GdPicture Image Identifier. The created image. The ReleaseGdPictureImage() method must be subsequently used to release the image from the memory.

code.description: Acquire multiple image from the document feeder to a multipage tiff image

example.code: Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim ImageID As Integer Dim bContinue As Boolean = True Dim MultipageHandle As Integer Dim ImageCount As Integer oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoFeed(True) 'Enable AutoFeed oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoScan(True) 'To achieve the maximum scanning rate oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetPixelType(TwainPixelType.TWPT_BW) '1 bit bw image oGdPictureImaging.TwainEnableDuplex(True) 'Duplex acquisition if supported oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetHideUI(True) 'Asks to the device to hide his GUI ImageCount = 0 Do ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(Me.Handle) If imageId <> 0 Then ImageCount = ImageCount + 1 If ImageCount = 1 Then MultipageHandle = ImageID oGdPictureImaging.TiffSaveAsMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle, "multipage.tif", TiffCompression.TiffCompressionAUTO) Else oGdPictureImaging.TiffAddToMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle, ImageID) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If End If Loop While oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetState() > TwainStatus.TWAIN_SOURCE_ENABLED oGdPictureImaging.TiffCloseMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(MultipageHandle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToDib(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Acquires a single image, from the currently selected Data Source to a DIB handle.
member.remarks: By default, the default data source (DS) is opened, displays its dialog, and determines all the parameters of the acquisition and transfer. If you want to (try to) hide the DS dialog, see TwainSetHideUI. Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. To set the TWAIN state to 4, use the TwainOpenDefaultSource() or TwainOpenSource() method.
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: 0: The bitmap could not created. Use the GetStat(), TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error. Non-zero: DIB handle. This handle must be subsequently released using the Marshal.FreeHGlobal() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToFile(System.String,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Acquires a single image, from the currently selected Data Source to a file. This method uses only the File transfer mode. The disk file mode is ideal when transferring large images that might encounter memory limitations with Native or memory mode. However, Disk File mode is a bit slower than other transfer mode.

remarks.para: By default, the default data source (DS) is opened, displays its dialog, and determines all the parameters of the acquisition and transfer.
If you want to (try to) hide the DS dialog, see TwainSetHideUI.
Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN)
To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
To set the TWAIN state to 4, use the TwainOpenDefaultSource() or TwainOpenSource() method.
Warning: To works, this method requires that the current Data source allows file transfer mode.
Use the TwainIsFileTransferModeAvailable() to check if the source support this mode of transfer.
The output image format should be negotiated with the TwainSetImageFileFormat() method.
The output image compression should be negotiated with the TwainSetCompression() method.

member.param: The path of the image file to create.
A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToFile(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Acquires a single image, from the currently selected Data Source to a file. This method uses only the File transfer mode. The disk file mode is ideal when transferring large images that might encounter memory limitations with Native or memory mode. However, Disk File mode is a bit slower than other transfer mode. -> The output image format should be negotiated with the TwainSetImageFileFormat() method. -> The output image compression should be negotiated with the TwainSetCompression() method.
member.remarks: By default, the default data source (DS) is opened, displays its dialog, and determines all the parameters of the acquisition and transfer. If you want to (try to) hide the DS dialog, see TwainSetHideUI. Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. To set the TWAIN state to 4, use the TwainOpenDefaultSource() or TwainOpenSource() method. Warning: To works, this method requires that the current Data source allows file transfer mode. Use the TwainIsFileTransferModeAvailable() to check if the source support this mode of transfer.
member.param: The path of the image file to create.
A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetInternalBehaviour(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Changes a specific TWAIN handling behaviour of the SDK. This method is experimental and should be used on GdPicture staff advice only!
member.param: The ID of the behaviour to control. Supported options are: - 1: FORWARD_ALL_MSG. Forces the control to translate and dispatch all messages sent to the data source manager. - 2: NEW_CALLBACK_MODEL. Enables the new callback model defined in the TWAIN 2.0 specifications. - 3: FORCE_PROXY_WINDOWS. Forces the control to use it's own proxy windows to intercept windows messages. - 4: NEW_CALLBACK_NO_HOOK. If NEW_CALLBACK_MODEL is activated, no message will be forwarded to the Data Source manager throught the DG_CONTROL/DAT_EVENT/MSG_PROCESSEVENT sequence.
True to enable the specified option, else False (default value for all options).

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainLogStart(System.String)
member.summary: Starts to log twain operations into file.
member.param: The path of the log file to create / append.
member.returns: True if success, else False (can't create or access to the log file).

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainLogStop
member.summary: Stops to log twain operations previously started by the TwainLogStart() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSaveConfiguration(System.String)
member.summary: Saves to a file the current settings of the opened source, e.g. DPI, paper size, color format.
member.param: The file to save the current device configuration.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

code.description: Open device & save its current configuration to a file

example.code: Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging If oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) Then If Not oGdPictureImaging.TwainSaveConfiguration("config1.cdd") = True Then MessageBox.show("Can't save current configuration. This capability is probably unsupported by the TWAIN device") End If Else MessageBox.show("Can't open default source") End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSaveConfiguration(System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Saves to an array of bytes the current settings of the opened source, e.g. DPI, paper size, color format.
member.param: The array of bytes save the current device configuration.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

code.description: Open device & save its current configuration to an array of bytes

example.code: Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging If oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) Then Dim Data() as Byte = Nothing If Not oGdPictureImaging.TwainSaveConfiguration(Data) = True Then MessageBox.show("Can't save current configuration. This capability is probably unsupported by the TWAIN device") End If Else MessageBox.show("Can't open default source") End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainLoadConfiguration(System.String)
member.summary: Loads from a file, settings of the opened source, e.g. DPI, paper size, color format.
member.param: The file containing the current device configuration data.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

code.description: Open device & load previously saved configuration from file

example.code: Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging If oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) Then If Not oGdPictureImaging.TwainLoadConfiguration("config1.cdd") = True Then MessageBox.show("Can't load current configuration. This capability is probably unsupported by the TWAIN device") End If ''' You can start acquisition process here! Else MessageBox.show("Can't open default source") End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainLoadConfiguration(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads from an array of bytes, settings of the opened source, e.g. DPI, paper size, color format.
member.param: The array of bytes containing the current device configuration data.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

code.description: Open device & load previously saved configuration from file

example.code: Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging If oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) Then If Not oGdPictureImaging.TwainLoadConfiguration(Data) = True Then MessageBox.show("Can't load current configuration. This capability is probably unsupported by the TWAIN device") End If ''' You can start acquisition process here ! Else MessageBox.show("Can't open default source") End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource
member.summary: Closes the open Data Source, if any. If the source is enabled, disables it first.
member.returns: True if success, else False. If there is not an open source, does nothing and returns TRUE.
member.remarks: This method should be called only if the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) or 5 (TWAIN_SOURCE_ENABLED). If success, the TWAIN state must be <= 3 (TWAIN_SM_OPEN). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSourceManager(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Closes the Data Source Manager. If a source is open, disables and closes it as needed.
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error. If the Source Manager is not open, does nothing and returns TRUE.
member.remarks: If success, the twain state must be <= 2 (TWAIN_SM_LOADED). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSourceManager(System.Int32)
member.summary: Closes the Data Source Manager. If a source is open, disables and closes it as needed.
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error. If the Source Manager is not open, does nothing and returns TRUE.
member.remarks: If success, the twain state must be <= 2 (TWAIN_SM_LOADED). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoSourceClose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tells to the control to close or not the opened source after a scan process.
member.param: Set True to tell to the control to close the opened source after an scan process, else False.
member.remarks: By default, the opened source is closed after a scan process. TwainSetAutoSourceClose(False) to change this Behavior.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainDisableSource
member.summary: Disables the open Data Source, if any. This closes the source's user interface.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error. If there is not an enabled source, does nothing and returns TRUE.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 5 (TWAIN_SOURCE_ENABLED). If success, the twain state must be 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainEnableDuplex(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Asks to the opened source to enable or disable the duplex scanning mode.
member.param: Set True to enable duplex mode else False.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN). To get the back of the acquired image, just another time an acquisition method. To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

example.code: Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim ImageSide1 As Integer, ImageSide2 As Integer oGdPictureImaging.TwainSelectSource(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) If oGdPictureImaging.TwainEnableDuplex(True) Then ImageSide1 = oGdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.SaveAsTIFF(ImageSide1, "side1.tif", TiffCompression.TiffCompressionAUTO) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageSide1) ImageSide2 = oGdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.SaveAsTIFF(ImageSide2, "side2.tif", TiffCompression.TiffCompressionAUTO) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageSide2) Else MessageBox.show("Duplex Scanning mode is not supported!") End If oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainEnableImprinter(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ask to the opened source to enable or not imprinter capability.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetApplicationInfo(System.Int32,System.Int32,GdPicture12.TwainLanguage,GdPicture12.TwainCountry,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asks to the component to register your application into TWAIN.
member.param: Your application major number version.
Your application minor number version.
The language ID of your application.
The country ID of your application.
\Version informations of your application.
The company name which provides the application.
The product family name.
The product name.

remarks.para: This method only if Twain state < 3 (TWAIN_SM_OPEN).
Use the GetStat() method to check if this method succeeded.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainUserClosedSource
member.summary: Asks if during the last acquisition process the user asked to close the device.
member.returns: True if during the last acquisition process the user asked to close the device, else False.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainLastXferFail
member.summary: Asks if the last acquisition process failed.
member.returns: True if the last acquisition process failed , else False.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainEndAllXfers
member.summary: Signals the Data Source to stop all the transfers.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 7 (TWAIN_TRANSFERRING) or 6 (TWAIN_TRANSFER_READY). If success, the twain state must be 5 (TWAIN_SOURCE_ENABLED). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainEndXfer
member.summary: Signals the Data Source to stop the current transfer. Go to either State 6 (TWAIN_TRANSFER_READY) if it has more transfers ready, or to State 5 (TWAIN_SOURCE_ENABLED) if it does not.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 7 (TWAIN_TRANSFERRING). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainStopFeeder
member.summary: If auto scan is turned ON, this command will stop the operation of the scanners automatic feeder. No other action is taken. The application may then continue to transfer any images that have been captured by the scanner.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 6 (TWAIN_TRANSFER_READY). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableImprinterModeCount
member.summary: Returns the number of available printer mode.
member.returns: If Success, non zero: The number of available printer mode. Else 0 if fail. Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableImprinterModeNo(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an available printer mode which can be used by the opened source in its current configuration.
member.param: Index of the available printer mode. Must be a value between 1 and TwainGetAvailableImprinterModeCount() returned value.
member.returns: If fail, returns -1 else if success, The selected file format value. A member of the TwainPrinterModes enumeration.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetImprinterMode(GdPicture12.TwainPrinterMode)
member.summary: Sets the current imprinter mode, if supported. Top/Bottom refer to duplex devices, and indicate if the printer is writing on the top or the bottom of the sheet of paper. Simplex devices use the top settings. Before/After indicates whether printing occurs before or after the sheet of paper has been scanned.
member.param: Printer mode. A member of the TwainPrinterMode enumeration.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetImprinterMode
member.summary: Returns the current imprinter mode, if any. Top/Bottom refer to duplex devices, and indicate if the printer is writing on the top or the bottom of the sheet of paper. Simplex devices use the top settings. Before/After indicates whether printing occurs before or after the sheet of paper has been scanned.
member.returns: A member of the TwainPrinterMode enumeration. If TWPR_UNSUPPORTED is returned, the capability is probably not supported by the current device -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableCapValuesCount(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities)
member.summary: Returns the number of available values for the selected TWAIN capability which can be used with it by the opened source in its current configuration.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
member.returns: If Success, non zero: Number of values available for the selected TWAIN capability. Else 0 if fail -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableCapValueNoNumeric(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an available numeric value for the selected TWAIN capability which can be used by the opened source in its current configuration. This method should be used to determine what are the supported value which can be used with the TwainSetCapCurrentNumeric() method.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
Index of the available value. Must be a value between 1 and TwainGetAvailableCapValuesCount() returned value.
member.returns: The selected available value of the selected TWAIN capability.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. This method can be used to set the following types of capabilities: TWTY_INT8 , TWTY_INT16, TWTY_INT32, TWTY_UINT8, TWTY_UINT16, TWTY_UINT32, TWTY_BOOL, TWTY_FIX32, TWTY_FRAME. You can determine the type of each TWAIN capability using the TwainGetCapItemType method or looking the twain references from http://www.twain.org

code.description: List all supported X resolution of the default source

example.code: Dim i As Integer Dim AvailableCapValue As Double oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) For i = 1 To oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableCapValuesCount(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_XRESOLUTION) AvailableCapValue = oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableCapValueNoNumeric(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_XRESOLUTION, i) MessageBox.show("Supported value no: " + Str(i) + " is: " + Str(AvailableCapValue)) Next i oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableCapValueNoString(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an available string value for the selected TWAIN capability which can be used by the opened source in its current configuration. This method should be used to determine what are the supported value which can be used with the TwainSetCapCurrentString() method.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
Index of the available value. Must be a value between 1 and TwainGetAvailableCapValuesCount() returned value.
member.returns: The selected available value of the selected TWAIN capability.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. This method can be used to set the following types of capabilities: TWTY_STR32, TWTY_STR64, TWTY_STR128, TWTY_STR255 . You can determine the type of each TWAIN capability using the TwainGetCapItemType method or looking the twain references from http://www.twain.org

code.description: List names of the halftone patterns supported by the default source

example.code: Dim i As Integer Dim AvailableCapValue As Double oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) For i = 1 To oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableCapValuesCount(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_HALFTONES) AvailableCapValue = oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetAvailableCapValueNoString(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_HALFTONES, i) MessageBox.show("Supported value no: " + Str(i) + " is: " + Str(AvailableCapValue)) Next i oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapQuerySupport(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Returns the Sources support status of a specific TWAIN capability.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
Returns if the source supports Get query with the specified capability.See TwainGetCapCurrentNumeric() and TwainGetCapCurrentString().
Returns if the source supports Set query with the specified capability. See TwainSetCapCurrentNumeric() and TwainSetCapCurrentString().
Returns if the source supports GetDefault query with the specified capability. See TwainGetCapDefaultNumeric() and TwainGetCapDefaultString().
Returns if the source supports GetCurrent query with the specified capability. See TwainGetCapCurrentNumeric() and TwainGetCapCurrentString().
Returns if the source supports Reset query with the specified capability. See: TwainResetCap().
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapCurrentNumeric(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities,System.Double@)
member.summary: Returns as numeric, the current value of a TWAIN capability.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
Returns the current value of the specified TWAIN capability.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. This method can be used to retrieve the following types of capabilities: TWTY_INT8 , TWTY_INT16, TWTY_INT32, TWTY_UINT8, TWTY_UINT16, TWTY_UINT32, TWTY_BOOL, TWTY_FIX32, TWTY_FRAME. You can determine the type of each TWAIN capability using the TwainGetCapItemType method or looking the twain references from http://www.twain.org

code.description: Catch the acquisition bit depth used by the default source

example.code: Dim CurrentCapValue As Double oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapCurrentNumeric(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_BITDEPTH, CurrentCapValue) MessageBox.Show("The current bit depth is: " + CurrentCapValue.ToString()) oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapDefaultNumeric(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities,System.Double@)
member.summary: Returns as numeric, the default value of a TWAIN capability.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
Returns the default value of the specified TWAIN capability.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. This method can be used to retrieve the following types of capabilities: TWTY_INT8 , TWTY_INT16, TWTY_INT32, TWTY_UINT8, TWTY_UINT16, TWTY_UINT32, TWTY_BOOL, TWTY_FIX32, TWTY_FRAME. You can determine the type of each TWAIN capability using the TwainGetCapItemType method or looking the twain references from http://www.twain.org

code.description: Gets the default the acquisition bit depth used by the default source

example.code: Dim DefaultCapValue As Double oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapDefaultNumeric(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_BITDEPTH, DefaultCapValue) MessageBox.Show("The default bit depth is: " + DefaultCapValue.ToString()) oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapRangeNumeric(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Returns the three parameters that define a Range for a TWAIN capability. Many capabilities allow users to select their current value from a range of regularly spaced values. The capability can specify the minimum and maximum acceptable values and the incremental step size between values. For example, resolution might be supported from 100 to 600 in steps of 50 (100, 150, 200, ..., 550, 600).
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
Output parameter. Starting value in the range.
Output parameter. Final value in the range.
Output parameter. Increment from nMinValue to nMaxValue.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. This method can be used to set the following types of capabilities: TWTY_INT8 , TWTY_INT16, TWTY_INT32, TWTY_UINT8, TWTY_UINT16, TWTY_UINT32, TWTY_BOOL, TWTY_FIX32, TWTY_FRAME. You can determine the type of each TWAIN capability using the TwainGetCapItemType method or looking the twain references from http://www.twain.org

code.description: Gets supported Brightness values

example.code: Dim bSuccess As Boolean Dim MinValue As Double, MaxValue As Double, StepValue As Double Dim i As Integer oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) bSuccess = oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapRangeNumeric(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_BRIGHTNESS, MinValue, MaxValue, StepValue) If bSuccess Then For i = CInt(MinValue) To CInt(MaxValue) Step CInt(StepValue) 'Here, you can catch & store the i value somewhere MessageBox.show("A supported value is: " + Str(i)) Next i End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainHasFeeder
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if it has a document feeder.
member.returns: True if the source indicates it has a document feeder else False.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. This method can returns FALSE with HP scanners with ADF.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainHasFlatBed
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if it has a flatbed.
member.returns: True if the source indicates it has a flatbed else False.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsFeederSelected
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if the document feeder is selected.
member.returns: True if the document feeder is selected, else False.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsDeviceOnline
member.summary: Returns the online statue of the current data source. If TRUE, the physical hardware (e.g., scanner, digital camera, image database, etc.) that represents the image source is attached, powered on, and communicating.
member.returns: True if the current data source is powered on and communicating, else False.
member.remarks: This method can be issued at any time to determine the availability of the image source

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSelectFeeder(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Asks to the opened source to select or deselect the document feeder.
member.param: If TRUE, Source must acquire data from the document feeder acquire area.If FALSE, Source must acquire data from the non-feeder acquire area like flatbed area.
member.returns: True if success, else False.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsFeederLoaded
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if there are documents in the feeder.
member.returns: True if there are documents, else False.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. The document feeder must be selected to use this method. To enable the document feeder you need to TwainSelectFeeder(True).

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetCapCurrentNumeric(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities,GdPicture12.TwainItemTypes,System.Double)
member.summary: Changes the current value of a TWAIN capability from a numeric value. The TwainGetAvailableCapValueNoNumeric() method should be used to determine what are the supported value which can be used with this method.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
A member of the TwainItemTypes enumeration.You can determine the type of each TWAIN capability using the TwainGetCapItemType method or looking the twain references from http://www.twain.org.
New value (as numeric) to set to the selected TWAIN capability.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

code.description: To set the X resolution to 100 DPI

example.code: bSuccess = oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetCapCurrentNumeric(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_XRESOLUTION, oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapItemType(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_XRESOLUTION), 100)

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetCapCurrentString(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities,GdPicture12.TwainItemTypes,System.String)
member.summary: Changes the current value of a TWAIN capability.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
A member of the TwainItemTypes enumeration.You can determine the type of each TWAIN capability using the TwainGetCapItemType method or looking the twain references from http://www.twain.org.
New value to set to the selected TWAIN capability.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

code.description: To set the ORDERED halftone mode

example.code: bSuccess = oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetCapCurrentString(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_HALFTONES, oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapItemType(TwainCapabilities.ICAP_HALFTONES), "ORDERED")

member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. This method can be used to set the following types of capabilities: TWTY_STR32, TWTY_STR64, TWTY_STR128, TWTY_STR255.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainResetCap(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities)
member.summary: Sets the current TWAIN capability value to default value.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetCapItemType(GdPicture12.TwainCapabilities)
member.summary: Returns the Item type used by a TWAIN capability.
member.param: A member of the TwainCapabilities enumeration.
member.returns: A member of the Tags enumeration.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetBitDepth
member.summary: Returns the number of bit per pixel for the current value of PixelType.
member.returns: If success: bit depth value. Else 0 if fail -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

remarks.para: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN)

Ambiguity in the Specification prior to version 2.2 may result in some Data Sources reporting just the depth-per-channel. In the majority of cases a value of 8 for ICAP_BITDEPTH when ICAP_PIXELTYPE is TWPT_RGB may be treated as if the bit depth is really 24.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetThreshold
member.summary: Returns the dividing line between black and white. This is the value the Source will use to threshold, if needed, when scanning B&W image.
member.returns: Current threshold value between 0 and 255. -1 If it is not supported by the current device (Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.)
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetThreshold(System.Int32)
member.summary: Try to specify the dividing line between black and white. This is the value the Source will use to threshold, if needed, when scanning B&W image.
member.param: Threshold value between 0 and 255.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainHasCameraPreviewUI
member.summary: Queries the current device for UI support for preview mode.
member.returns: True if the Source supports preview UI else False: Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetPlanarChunky
member.summary: Returns the color data formats There are two Options, "planar" And "chunky."
member.returns: 0 for Chunky or 1 for planar. -1 If it is not supported by the current device -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetPlanarChunky(System.Int32)
member.summary: Try to specify the color data formats There are two Options, "planar" And "chunky".
member.param: 0 for Chunky or 1 for Planar.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainGetPixelFlavor
member.summary: Returns the pixel 'flavor' (0 is black or white). CHOCOLATE means this pixel represents the darkest data value that can be generated by the device (the darkest available optical value may measure greater than 0). VANILLA means this pixel represents the lightest data value that can be generated by the device (the lightest available optical value may measure greater than 0).
member.returns: A member of the TwainPixelFlavor enumeration. returns TwainPixelFlavorUndefined (-1) if it is not supported by the current device -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetPixelFlavor(GdPicture12.TwainPixelFlavor)
member.summary: Try to specify the pixel 'flavor' (0 is black or white). CHOCOLATE means this pixel represents the darkest data value that can be generated by the device (the darkest available optical value may measure greater than 0). VANILLA means this pixel represents the lightest data value that can be generated by the device (the lightest available optical value may measure greater than 0).
member.param: A member of the TwainPixelFlavor enumeraion.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.summary: Returns the current brightness.

member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: This opens the source selected in the Select Source dialog. If some source is already open, does nothing and returns TRUE. Call this method for each scanning process or to set the TWAIN state to 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) when the TWAIN state is 3 (TWAIN_SM_OPEN) or 2 (TWAIN_SM_LOADED) or 1 (TWAIN_PRESESSION).
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: If this returns TRUE, TWAIN is in STATE 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN).

code.description: Acquire multiple image from the document feeder to a multipage tiff image

example.code: Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim ImageID As Integer Dim bContinue As Boolean = True Dim MultipageHandle As Integer Dim ImageCount As Integer oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoFeed(True) 'Enable AutoFeed oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoScan(True) 'To achieve the maximum scanning rate oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetPixelType(TwainPixelType.TWPT_BW) '1 bit bw image oGdPictureImaging.TwainEnableDuplex(True) 'Duplex acquisition if supported oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetHideUI(True) 'Asks to the device to hide his GUI ImageCount = 0 Do ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(Me.Handle) If imageId <> 0 Then ImageCount = ImageCount + 1 If ImageCount = 1 Then MultipageHandle = ImageID oGdPictureImaging.TiffSaveAsMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle, "multipage.tif", TiffCompression.TiffCompressionAUTO) Else oGdPictureImaging.TiffAddToMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle, ImageID) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If End If Loop While oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetState() > TwainStatus.TWAIN_SOURCE_ENABLED oGdPictureImaging.TiffCloseMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(MultipageHandle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(System.Int32)
member.summary: This opens the source selected in the Select Source dialog. If some source is already open, does nothing and returns TRUE. Call this method for each scanning process or to set the TWAIN state to 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) when the TWAIN state is 3 (TWAIN_SM_OPEN) or 2 (TWAIN_SM_LOADED) or 1 (TWAIN_PRESESSION).
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: If this returns TRUE, TWAIN is in STATE 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN).

code.description: Acquire multiple image from the document feeder to a multipage tiff image

example.code: Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim ImageID As Integer Dim bContinue As Boolean = True Dim MultipageHandle As Integer Dim ImageCount As Integer oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoFeed(True) 'Enable AutoFeed oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoScan(True) 'To achieve the maximum scanning rate oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetPixelType(TwainPixelType.TWPT_BW) '1 bit bw image oGdPictureImaging.TwainEnableDuplex(True) 'Duplex acquisition if supported oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetHideUI(True) 'Asks to the device to hide his GUI ImageCount = 0 Do ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(Me.Handle) If imageId <> 0 Then ImageCount = ImageCount + 1 If ImageCount = 1 Then MultipageHandle = ImageID oGdPictureImaging.TiffSaveAsMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle, "multipage.tif", TiffCompression.TiffCompressionAUTO) Else oGdPictureImaging.TiffAddToMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle, ImageID) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If End If Loop While oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetState() > TwainStatus.TWAIN_SOURCE_ENABLED oGdPictureImaging.TiffCloseMultiPageFile(MultipageHandle) oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(MultipageHandle) oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource()

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainOpenSource(System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the source with the given name. If another source is open, closes it and attempts to open the specified source. First this method for each scanning process or to set the TWAIN state to 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) when the TWAIN state is 3 (TWAIN_SM_OPEN) or 2 (TWAIN_SM_LOADED) or 1 (TWAIN_PRESESSION).
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
The name of the source to open.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: If this returns TRUE, TWAIN is in STATE 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN).

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainOpenSource(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the source with the given name. If another source is open, closes it and attempts to open the specified source. First this method for each scanning process or to set the TWAIN state to 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) when the TWAIN state is 3 (TWAIN_SM_OPEN) or 2 (TWAIN_SM_LOADED) or 1 (TWAIN_PRESESSION).
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
The name of the source to open.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: If this returns TRUE, TWAIN is in STATE 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN).

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainResetImageLayout
member.summary: Asks to the opened device to reset the area to scan, sometimes called the ROI (Region of Interest).
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSelectSource(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Select twain device for capture. This method posts the Source Manager's Select Source dialog box.
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: True if success, else False. False indicates: 1- The user canceled the dialog. 2- The Source Manager found no data sources installed. 3- There was a failure before the Select Source dialog could be posted.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSelectSource(System.Int32)

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutomaticRotation(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If this option is available on opened source, try to enable or disable the automatic rotation of image capability.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. There are no criteria for how this automatic rotation is determined. A Source may use a field of text, or some distinguishing non-text field, such as a barcode or a logo, or it may rely on form recognition to help rotate the document.
member.param: True to enable automatic rotation, else False.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if support the Automatic rotation, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsAutomaticRotationEnabled
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if the automatic rotation of images capability is enabled or not.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if the automatic rotation is enabled, FALSE otherwise.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsAutoScanAvailable
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if she can support the automatic scan capability. This capability is intended to boost the performance of a Source. The fundamental assumption behind AutoScan is that the device is able to capture images without waiting for the Application to request the image transfers. The default behavior is undefined, because some high volume devices are capable of anything but TwainIsAutoScanAvailable() return value being equal to TRUE.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if support the automatic scan, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsAutoScanEnabled
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if the automatic scan capability is enabled or not.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if the automatic scan is enabled, FALSE otherwise.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsBarcodeDetectionAvailable
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if she can support the barcode detection capability.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: Boolean. TRUE if support the barcode detection, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

code.description: Acquire single image and detect its barcodes

example.code: Private Sub Command1_Click(ByVal eventSender As System.Object, ByVal eventArgs As System.EventArgs) Handles Command4.Click Dim ImageID As Integer Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPicture.GdPictureImaging If oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) Then If oGdPictureImaging.TwainIsBarcodeDetectionAvailable Then oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetBarcodeDetection(True) ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(Me.Handle) If imageId <> 0 Then Dim BarCodeCount As Integer = oGdPictureImaging.TwainBarCodeGetCount MessageBox.show(Str(BarCodeCount) + " barcode has been found in the scanned image") For i As Integer = 1 To BarCodeCount MessageBox.show("Type of barcode " + Str(i) + " is: " + oGdPictureImaging.TwainBarCodeGetType(i).ToString) MessageBox.show("Value of barcode " + Str(i) + " is: " + oGdPictureImaging.TwainBarCodeGetValue(i)) Next oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If Else MessageBox.show("Error: Barcode detection is not available on this scanner") End If oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource() MessageBox.show("Done !") Else MessageBox.show("can't open default source, twain state is: " & oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetState.ToString) End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsBarcodeDetectionEnabled
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if the barcode detection capability is enabled or not.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: Boolean. TRUE if the barcode detection is enabled, FALSE otherwise.

code.description: Acquire single image and detect its barcodes

example.code: Private Sub Command1_Click(ByVal eventSender As System.Object, ByVal eventArgs As System.EventArgs) Handles Command4.Click Dim ImageID As Integer Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPicture.GdPictureImaging If oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource(Me.Handle) Then If oGdPictureImaging.TwainIsBarcodeDetectionAvailable Then oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetBarcodeDetection(True) ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.TwainAcquireToGdPictureImage(Me.Handle) If imageId <> 0 Then Dim BarCodeCount As Integer = oGdPictureImaging.TwainBarCodeGetCount MessageBox.show(Str(BarCodeCount) + " barcode has been found in the scanned image") For i As Integer = 1 To BarCodeCount MessageBox.show("Type of barcode " + Str(i) + " is: " + oGdPictureImaging.TwainBarCodeGetType(i).ToString) MessageBox.show("Value of barcode " + Str(i) + " is: " + oGdPictureImaging.TwainBarCodeGetValue(i)) Next oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If Else MessageBox.show("Error: Barcode detection is not available on this scanner") End If oGdPictureImaging.TwainCloseSource() MessageBox.show("Done !") Else MessageBox.show("can't open default source, twain state is: " & oGdPictureImaging.TwainGetState.ToString) End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainIsAutoFeedAvailable
member.summary: Asks to the opened source if she can support the automatic page feeding capability. When AutoFeed capability is enabled, the Source will automatically feed the next page from the document feeder after the number of frames negotiated for capture from each page are acquired.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.returns: TRUE if support the automatic page feeding, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

member.returns: TRUE if the automatic page feeding is enabled, FALSE otherwise.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetAutoScan(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tries to enable or disable the auto scan scanning capability. Setting this to TRUE gives the scanner permission to 'scan ahead'. i.e. to pull pages from the feeder and scan them before they have been requested. On high-speed scanners, you may have to enable auto scan to achieve the maximum scanning rate.
member.remarks: This will fail on most flatbeds & cameras, and some 'feeder' Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.param: True to enable autoscan, else False.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

member.summary: Tries to enable or disable the automatic color detection capability.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN (4) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.
member.param: True to enable autoscan, else False.
member.returns: TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetBitDepth(System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies the number of bit per pixel for the current value of PixelType.
member.param: Bit Depth.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

remarks.para: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is >= 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN)

Ambiguity in the Specification prior to version 2.2 may result in some Data Sources reporting just the depth-per-channel. In the majority of cases a value of 8 for ICAP_BITDEPTH when ICAP_PIXELTYPE is TWPT_RGB may be treated as if the bit depth is really 24.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetBrightness(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to set the current brightness for the next acquisition.
member.param: The TWAIN standard *says* that the range for this cap is -1000 ... +1000.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetContrast(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to set the current contrast for the next acquisition.
member.param: The TWAIN standard *says* that the range for this cap is -1000 ... +1000.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetPixelType(GdPicture12.TwainPixelType)
member.summary: Tries to set the current pixel type for the selected twain source.
member.param: A member of the TwainPixelType enumeration.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetResolution(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to set the current resolution (in both x & y). Resolution is in dots per inch.
member.param: The new resolution.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetDebugMode(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns On or Off the Debug Mode of GDTWAIN. Displays a message box for each step of the scanning process.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetDSMPath(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the path TWAIN Data Source Manager. The TWAIN DSM is the windows library (dll) providing support for the TWAIN standard. Can be TWAIN_32.DLL or TWAINDSM.DLL for TWAIN 2.0 support. By default, the toolkits searches the Windows path for the TWAIN DSM but on Citrix the Windows directory can be redirected for users.
member.param: The path of the TWAIN Data Source Manager.

code.description: Loading the TWAIN 2.0 DSM

example.code: oGdPictureImaging.TwainSetDSMPath("Windows\TWAINDSM.DLL") oGdPictureImaging.TwainOpenDefaultSource

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetErrorMessage(System.Boolean)

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetImageLayout(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Specifies the physical area (a rectangle) to be acquired during the next image transfer.
member.param: Value of the left-most edge of the area to scan measured in inches.
Value of the top-most edge of the area to scan measured in inches.
Value of the right-most edge of the area to scan measured in inches. Note: ImageWidth = Right - Left.
Value of the bottom-most edge of the area to scan measured in inches. Note: ImageHeight = Bottom - Top.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

Value of the top-most edge of the area to scan measured in inches.
Value of the right-most edge of the area to scan measured in inches. Note: ImageWidth = Right - Left.
Value of the bottom-most edge of the area to scan measured in inches. Note: ImageHeight = Bottom - Top.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetMultiTransfer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Changes the multiple transfers mode for acquisition.
member.param: If set to False, all the pending transfers are canceled after the last acquisition process.
member.remarks: The multiple transfers mode is automatically sets to True by the TwainSetAutoFeed(True) and the TwainEnableDuplex(True) calls.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainSetPaperSize(GdPicture12.TwainPaperSize)

member.param: A member of the TwainPaperSize enumeration.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. NONE (0) indicates that the maximum image size supported by the device is to be used.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainShowSetupDialogSource(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Starts the selected device's settings dialog, if this is supported.
member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. You can use the TwainUserClosedSource method to determine if the user pressed the Cancel button of the displayed interface.

member.remarks: Before using this method check that the TWAIN state is 4 (TWAIN_SOURCE_OPEN) To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method. You can use the TwainUserClosedSource method to determine if the user pressed the Cancel button of the displayed interface.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.TwainUnloadSourceManager(System.IntPtr)

member.param: A Window Handle IE: Me.Handle. In most applications you can use nothing but on Citrix and WTS, this must be a top-level window or a child of a top level window.
member.returns: True if success, else False -> Use TwainGetLastResultCode() and TwainGetLastConditionCode() methods for diagnosing the error.
member.remarks: This will fail if the Source Manager is open. If success, the twain state must be 1 (TWAIN_PRESESSION). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.remarks: This will fail if the Source Manager is open. If success, the twain state must be 1 (TWAIN_PRESESSION). To get the TWAIN state, use the TwainGetState() method.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaOpenSource(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a WIA source.
member.param: A WIA source identifier which can be retrieved with the WiaGetSourceID or the WiaSelectSource methods.
member.returns: True if success, False otherwhise. Use WiaGetLastError() methods for diagnosing the error.

code.description: Acquire multiple image from the flatbed to JPEG image. You can find more sophisticated samples in the package.

example.code: Dim ImageID As Integer Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim SourceID as string = oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectSource If oGdPictureImaging.WiaOpenSource(SourceID) Then 'Open selected source oGdPictureImaging.WiaShowSetupDialogSource() 'Displays device configuration oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectFeeder(False) 'Select flatbed ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.WiaAcquireToGdPictureImage() If imageId <> 0 Then Call oGdPictureImaging.SaveAsJPEG(ImageID, My.Application.Info.DirectoryPath & "image.jpg", 75) Call oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If MessageBox.show("Done. WIA status: " + oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetLastError.ToString) oGdPictureImaging.WiaCloseSource() End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaCloseSource
member.summary: \Closes the open Data Source, if any.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaAcquireToFile(System.String,GdPicture12.WiaImageFormat,System.Boolean)
member.summary: \Acquires a single image, from the currently selected Data Source to a file.
member.param: The destination of the file.
A member of the WiaImageFormat enumeration.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaAcquireToFile(System.String)
member.summary: Acquires a single image, from the currently selected Data Source to a file, in the native format provided by the data source. The format of the image to be transferred can be determined calling the WiaGetImageExtension() method. '''
member.param: The destination of the file.
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Extract all available image from the memory card of a digital camera, in they native format.

example.code: Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim WiaSourceID As String = oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectSource(WiaSourceType.WiaSourceCamera) If WiaSourceID <> "" Then oGdPictureImaging.WiaOpenSource(WiaSourceID) Dim ImageCount As Integer = oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetImageCount If ImageCount > 0 Then For i As Integer = 1 To ImageCount oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectImageIdx(i) Dim FileExt As String = oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetImageExtension() oGdPictureImaging.WiaAcquireToFile("Picture" + Str(i) + "." + FileExt) Next MessageBox.show("Done") Else MessageBox.show("there is no image available for transfer") End If Else MessageBox.show("No source can be selected") End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaAcquireToGdPictureImage
member.summary: Acquires a single image, from the currently selected Data Source to a file.
member.returns: 0: The image could not created. Use the GetStat() and WiaGetLastError() methods for diagnosing the error. Non-zero: GdPicture Image Identifier. The created image. The ReleaseGdPictureImage() method must be subsequently used to release the image from the memory.

code.description: Acquire multiple image from the flatbed to JPEG image. You can find more sophisticated samples in the package.

example.code: Dim ImageID As Integer Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim SourceID as string = oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectSource If oGdPictureImaging.WiaOpenSource(SourceID) Then 'Open selected source oGdPictureImaging.WiaShowSetupDialogSource() 'Displays device configuration oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectFeeder(False) 'Select flatbed ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.WiaAcquireToGdPictureImage() If imageId <> 0 Then Call oGdPictureImaging.SaveAsJPEG(ImageID, My.Application.Info.DirectoryPath & "image.jpg", 75) Call oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If MessageBox.show("Done. WIA status: " + oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetLastError.ToString) oGdPictureImaging.WiaCloseSource() End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaTakePictureToGdPictureImage
member.summary: Asks the the currently selected Data Source to acquire an image, the return it as a GdPicture Image. This method should be used with camera only.
member.returns: 0: The image could not created. Use the GetStat() and WiaGetLastError() methods for diagnosing the error. Non-zero: GdPicture Image Identifier. The created image. The ReleaseGdPictureImage() method must be subsequently used to release the image from the memory.

code.description: Take a picture from a camera and save it to JPEG file.

example.code: Dim ImageID As Integer Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim SourceID as string = oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectSource(WiaSourceType.WiaSourceCamera Or WiaSourceType.WiaSourceVideo) If oGdPictureImaging.WiaOpenSource(SourceID) Then 'Open selected source ImageID = oGdPictureImaging.WiaTakePictureToGdPictureImage() If imageId <> 0 Then Call oGdPictureImaging.SaveAsJPEG(ImageID, My.Application.Info.DirectoryPath & "image.jpg", 75) Call oGdPictureImaging.ReleaseGdPictureImage(ImageID) End If MessageBox.show("Done. WIA status: " + oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetLastError.ToString) oGdPictureImaging.WiaCloseSource() End If

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaGetImageIntent
member.summary: Returns the current image intent setting for the selected device. The driver chooses the bit depth, in dots per inch, and other settings that it determines are appropriate for the selected intent.
member.returns: A member of the WiaImageIntent enumeration.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaGetImageCount
member.summary: Returns the number of available image from the selected device, for example: the number of pictures stored on the memory card of a digital camera.
member.returns: A member of the WiaImageIntent enumeration.

code.description: Extract all available image from the memory card of a digital camera, in they native format.

example.code: Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim WiaSourceID As String = oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectSource(WiaSourceType.WiaSourceCamera) If WiaSourceID <> "" Then oGdPictureImaging.WiaOpenSource(WiaSourceID) Dim ImageCount As Integer = oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetImageCount If ImageCount > 0 Then For i As Integer = 1 To ImageCount oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectImageIdx(i) Dim FileExt As String = oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetImageExtension() oGdPictureImaging.WiaAcquireToFile("Picture" + Str(i) + "." + FileExt) Next MessageBox.show("Done") Else MessageBox.show("there is no image available for transfer") End If Else MessageBox.show("No source can be selected") End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.WiaSelectImageIdx(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the index of the image to be transferred from the selected device.
member.param: The index of the image to be acquired. Must be a value between 1 and WiaGetImageCount().
member.returns: A member of the GdPictureStatus enumeration.

code.description: Extract all available image from the memory card of a digital camera, in they native format.

example.code: Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click Dim oGdPictureImaging As New GdPictureImaging Dim WiaSourceID As String = oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectSource(WiaSourceType.WiaSourceCamera) If WiaSourceID <> "" Then oGdPictureImaging.WiaOpenSource(WiaSourceID) Dim ImageCount As Integer = oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetImageCount If ImageCount > 0 Then For i As Integer = 1 To ImageCount oGdPictureImaging.WiaSelectImageIdx(i) Dim FileExt As String = oGdPictureImaging.WiaGetImageExtension() oGdPictureImaging.WiaAcquireToFile("Picture" + Str(i) + "." + FileExt) Next MessageBox.show("Done") Else MessageBox.show("there is no image available for transfer") End If Else MessageBox.show("No source can be selected") End If End Sub

member.name: M:GdPicture12.GdPictureImaging.Dispose
member.summary: This method disposes the GdPictureImaging object, by closing and releasing all related resources. All non released GdPicture Images allocated by this object will remain available into the memory until they will be destroyed by the ReleaseGdPictureImage() method of any other GdPictureImaging object.

member.name: M:GdPicture12.AnnotationManager.ARGBI(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)

The red component. Valid values are 0 to 255.

The blue component. Valid values are 0 to 255.
